#### Open Source tools for Data Science and Engieering


Open source tools provide access to competitive features and integrations free of charge without depending on software vendors. They also possess key technical capabilities such as scaling, adaptability, and consolidation.

In this track, we will explore the best open source data visualization tools, along with their specific strengths and weaknesses. 

This track will not feature the R programming language. Rather it will explore the wordl beyond R, with a view to exploring what collaborations should be explore in the future.

#### Examples

* Apache Druid

* Apache Redis
